column1: I love the way the whip goes on with no oily feel after. It covers well and truly makes my skin softer to the touch. The added sun screen also is in it so one less daily add product. The cost is fair and always available in store or on line to order like I did. Shipped right to my house in excellent packaging. Thank you'

I love this product! It's smells so nice and I love how it makes my skin feel so silky matte! And it also covers your pores so when applying your makeup over top of the moisturizer it's flawless! I highly recommend it for everyday use before bed and also during the day! Diane H.

I've been using the night time regeneration cream for years and finally tried this cream with spf - especially since it advertised matte finish. I have oily skin and it does not leave my face matte, more dewy. I've tried this with my foundation alone and with my usual primer - it works both ways! I have noticed an improvement in my skin in just a short time- been tempted to skip the foundation with just some powder (again, oily skin). Definitely recommend!

I have been searching for a moisturizer that will moisturize dry areas, while not breaking out the oily areas. I wanted to feel as if I hadn't put anything on at alI, one I could wear under makeup daily and at night. All of this seemed a tall order as nothing worked, no matter the cost. The skin advisor tool suggested Whip Regenerist.This moisturizer is by far the best product I've ever used. It does absolutely everything I wanted and leaves my skin feeling better than I could have hoped.

I bought this expecting to see a lighter feeling face cream than I had been using. I have used Oil of Olay face cream for 50 years and have never had any problems with its texture. This new jar with the “whipped” label is rather disgusting. It is much heavier more like partially hardened coconut oil. I am not happy with it being called whipped when it doesn't resemble “whipped”.

I was given a trail size of this to try. First let me say that before trying this product I didn't really have a face routine other then normal washing. But after using this product I would like to make it apart of my new routine. The only thing I wasn't to happy with was after being outside it made my face feel a little on the oily side. Other then that i loved the feel of it. It has a light smell to it, but nothing over powering. It went on smooth. I would buy the product to use.

I've used regenerist whip for a few days and I am very disappointed with the way it makes my skin look and feel. My face feels greasy & looks shiny. I never had this problem with other moisturizers. It says it is oil free. After seeing commercials for this product I couldn't wait to try it but it is definitely not what they describe on tv.

I bought this because I thought it would be great for my skin while at the beach. It felt thick when I put it on my face. And while applying my foundation it made my makeup ball up. I had to wash it off so I could apply my foundation all over again. Even after applying the Olay whip I even waited an hour to put on my foundation and it still balled up. Won't be buying this product again. I will take it back to the store.

I've already been in love with the regenerist line, so I was so excited to hear the Olay whips came out with an SPF25 version! It's light, airy, and absorbs into my skin without looking oily or shiny. It wears great under makeup too! I highly recommend the regenerist whip SPF25! Thanks Olay for sending this my way.

I honestly can't recommend this sunscreen enough.  It gives my skin all the protection it needs, while moisturizing like nobody's business.  It's rich and creamy yet absorbs super quickly so you're left with this magical glow that leaves your face soft, smooth and dewy.  An absolute must-try for those of you looking to up your skincare game!  Product provided by Olay, but all opinions are my own.

Olay sent this to me and I love how smooth it is! It makes for a great makeup base. It's lightweight and doesn't make my skin feel greasy. I love that it has SPF so I am multitasking when I use it and don't need to use another separate SPF product! I definitely recommend trying it out!

I have used Olay for years I always kind of laughed when I saw the advertisements on TV or in the magazines because I had never put anything on my face. When I did try moisture's they just felt like a mask had been put on my face. Olay on the other hand, felt light, wonderful. Because of my financial condition I have not been able to purchase the cream, so am very pleased to receive a free sample. Thank you, and my face thanks you.

I always wanted to try this product. I don't like putting on moisturizers because I can't stand the greasy feeling it leaves on my skin! I always have to fight the urge to wash it off IMMEDIATELY!! I received this product as a sample and it was the BEST THING I EVER DID! I absolutely LOVE this product and it's a must have!! THANK YOU OLAY!!!

It's deceptive when the box is 1/3 empty space, so what integrity does the product have? The bottle is more appealing than the box so do away with the box. This reduces trash and transport costs and ultimately my cost. If the 1st ingredient is water, is that something I can add post purchase? To post comments I had to agree to terms and conditions. There should be a link there for terms/conditions and include disclaimer that Olay doesn't sell my email.

I've received this product for and honest review. This face lotion is too perfume. My skin type is combination, after applying the lotion on to my face, my forehead were very oily, luckily I did not get any breakout. My skin texture didn't change to my knowledge( better or worse). Overall it was just ok. The price is high for me, for what I consider just ok. I won't be buying it when it run out.

I was a little hesitant to try this product due to the price. However, I received a sample size jar (from another retailer) and after trying it decided to get it in the SPF version. I am a week shy of my 62nd birthday. I am somewhat happy with how my skin looks as far as wrinkling is concerned, and I don't really expect miracles from any product I use. I basically want my skin to feel soft and also any moisturizer I use to work well under foundation. I feel like this product fits the bill and the SPF is an added bonus.
I would love to try this. I have heard it is really good wrinkle remover. I really need help wih wrinkles and my face needs to be revitelized.
Love how weightless and soft it feels going on! I drive a Topless Jeep all spring/summer/fall in the Midwest and don't get sunburned on my face! LOVE LOVE LOVE
I use this product in the morning but at night as times. As I get older (41) my skin tends to dry, this helps restore my skin to a softer & youthful look.
I was thrilled to find a moisturizer that worked well without being greasy. To find one with sun protection was fantastic! I use this moisturizer and skin protection daily with excellent results.

I am 63 years old and my face is very oily. I tired many moisturizers and it made my skin more shinning and oily...I use this product once and my face and neck look fresh and smooth..looks like I had a facelift...I look 20 years younger.
I love this product so much, I'm a total Olay convert and started using Olay face wash. Love it too!
I like everything about this product, So great to have moisturizer and sunscreen in 1. And not greasy, very light feeling.

Not worth the money. Even with a tight lid, the product evaporated or dried up easily. Other light moisturizing spf creams such as Aveeno are better quality for the money.

This is the BEST product that I have used, and I am so thankful that Olay finally formulated their cream with a SPF 25! This product is perfect for my lifestyle and delicate skin. Thank you! Please DO NOT discontinue this cream.....ever!!

I have always perfected Olay and I have been using for years. The last couple products I trip one being the Regenterist Whip beads up on my face after a while and turns into complete mess....I started using other products one being nitrogen's daily Cleans and creams and I hate it but they tend do also not only be a better product but they also do what they say they are suppose to do to help your skin. Sorry Olay I may have to throw you away for good.

For at least15 years my son's feet itched fiercely under the bottom. We seen our share of m.d.'s. He'd scratch yo bleeding. His feet were always a red horrible mess. In July I was looking for something preferably w/out dyes or petroleum but that had some vitamins in it. I found this. By chance I tried it once on my son. Immediately the itch ceased. I'm over the moon.!!

Im not understanding all the bad reviews? I got this and i love it! Its not greasy its very light an airy and it absorbs very quickly and leaves my skin very softand no after looks of oil laying on your skin. I first got it in the mail as a sample and that was when i fell in love with it. If you buy it just give it some time it isnt a miracle worker.
Amazing product - out performs any other moisturizer I've ever tried. I've tried some very expensive ones too!
Amazing product so light on my skin! love it! and the scent is insanely good:)
About 4 hours after application, the moisturizer just started peeling off my skin.
I have not tried it yet but I would like to cause all I use is olay. On face and body Thank you but
Love e product, but the scent is Extremely overwhelming and too strong. Please make one that is fragrance free*
I received a sample in the mail I noticed a difference immediately! It made my dry 60 year old skin feel wonderful!
Had to try this cream. Was highly recommended on an episode of Dr. Oz. It's very light, and not greasy. I am really pleased thus far.
Can't wait to bring this to Italy over the summer! Love how lightweight this is - no grease and no mess! (I received compensation for this review)
Olay is the best choice in this world and it looks amazing when you have used this products. Thank you
It goes on very lightly, never feels heavy or oily, and a little goes a long way. I also love the light scent. I have found my forever moisturizer.
Greasy product. Advertised as matte. Did not play well under makeup. Pores were magnified. So disappointed in Olay. I returned it.

I have been using this for a few days and i can definetly tell a difference already! You do not have to use much at all so it is worth the price because it will last for a long time! Goes on smooth and leaves my face looking more energized and soft!
This is my favorite Olay product. It feels like nothing is there.
It is fluffy, smooth and soft on the skin. I love this product ALOT!
i love the product , and the way it was shipped. thanks
I have oily skin and this product works great for my skin. My makeup looks flawless

I have oily skin to begin with and thought this product would do what it says and leave my skin matte throughout the day, however, after a few hours of application I would start seeing a shine and then towards the end of the day my skin would feel like there's a thick greasy coat that I could scrape off. So the product does not meet my expectations and I would not recommend it to people with oily skin. I do not care for the tub container either. Seems less sanitary.

I must say first off I was impressed that you sent a full sized bottle for me to work with. Yet I don't seem to need to use very much of the product each time. However it is so light and airy yet covers the face extremely well. This product is so wonderfully light it dries in seconds . Basically no waiting around for the product to dry yet my face is very soft to the touch. I am in my mid sixties so I use a lot of moisturizer. I will continue to purchase this. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]
Love the Olay Mist.......it really refreshes my face.
great product. I have used olay products for years and this one is great for daytime
I love the feel of this. It's not heavy or greasy on my skin!
I love this cream them let my skin so soft
light not heavy - quickly absorbed - pleasant fragrance
This feels really nice on my face. After application my skin felt smooth and moisturized.
It feels so good, and is the best for the price so far.
I love Olay Regenerist whip Face Moisturizer! It nourishes my face and I look younger.
I love this product but buying it from the manufacture is way too expensive
Been using oil of olay since i was a teenager, am now 60 wouldnt use anything else love it!!
Awesome product makes your face feel smooth and soft no dry skin no harm from the cold weather or even the Sun
Light weight works smells great love it! It's none greasy! I use the whip regenerouse. I hope they don't change a thing it's perfect!

I got this lotion as a sample in the mail hoping this would work for me since I have sensitive skin and have trouble finding the right products for my skin. I was surprised that I had no problem with it. My skin felt very soft, no redness, no irritation, no discomfort. Im so happy that I was able to find something that worked for me.

I bought this due to all the amazing reviews it was getting and I was not disappointed! The texture is amazing and the fragrance is light and not overwhelming. The transformation of my skin has been great. My age spots have lessened and my skin feels amazing

Not only does this stuff look and smell like cheap conditioner it also feels like it. Sticky and filmy on the skin not at all pleasant. Super bummed I bought it, normally I pass along things that aren't for me in the hopes that someone else may enjoy it... but for this I couldn't imagine passing this buck

The product in the jar was definitely NOT whipped. It had a paste-like consistency to it. I did try it. It never changed consistency and went on with some pulling and dragging. Applying liquid foundation did not happen. The foundation grabbed on to the moisturizer and would not blend. I had to wash it all off and start over with my regular moisturizer, I don't know if the product was bad or if it is supposed to be like this. For the money, this was a big bomb.

The smell is nice, but it felt greasy on my skin. The worse part was how watery it made my eyes. I made sure to only apply a half inch below my bottom lash line, and not on my eye lids. I had to wash my face three times before my eyes felt better. I'm wondering if it's the sunscreen. I love Olay products, but this one I'll have to return.

Took the "28 Day Challenge" with Olay Regenerist Whip Moisturizer and Olay Eyes. Did not improve my skin in 28 days as advertised. Completed the required form for the promised refund, sent it in along with original store receipt as required. Have yet to receive the guaranteed refund for the products. I will say that the whipped feel of the products is wonderful - there is no greasy feel at all as I have found with other skin products. Just wish it would have improved my skin.

I've never really tried any face products before, but my friend told me to try the olay whips. So i ended up buying the tan one . It leaves your face feeling so smooth and fresh, and it smells good too. I also use it underneath my foundation and it still leaves my skin feeling fresh & soft. I've only had it for a week now but I can totally tell a difference. Well worth my money spent.

I recently received a sample of the Olay Regenerist Whip Face Moisturizer and I was blown away by how amazing it felt on my skin, the cream felt so light and airy, and seemed to absorb instantly, it didn't feel heavy at all the way some moisturizers do.. Even the scent of this product was light, not too heavy or strong, and it smelled amazing.. I plan to purchase some on my next shopping trip and look forward to using this product..

I requested a sample of this cream and expected to love it. The advertising made it sound so rich and creamy. It was watery, not whipped at all. It did sink in right away but my skin felt just as dry as it did before I put it on, maybe even more dry... how is that even possible? Very disappointed and I would not recommend to anyone.

I bought it yesterday after finding out it also has SPF which I really need for my daily walk. I used the regular whip a while ago. That did it! So that's why I bought this. I put it in this morning. Ooohhhh my it feels light, smooth and soft unlike other moisturizer I use is sticky, bit greasy and icky. It's going to be empty when I use it for my night regime before moving in to Olay night cream very soon. I'm going to stick with Olay for long time!

i have been using Okay products for a long time. When I saw the whipped version, I decided to try it. Apply the face cream as recommended, but afterward my face felt right and very dry. My wrinkles were more prominent than ever before. Giving the product a chance, I continue to use it, but finally gave up and threw the jar away. What a waste of money!

I don't use facial products due to them feeling heavy and greasy. I got a free sample of olay whip and decided to try it. glad I did. it was light, non greasy, and it hydrated my obviously dry face. oh and left it so soft. I will recommend this to others and will continue to use it myself......thank you

This product initially feels good going on however while smoothing on my face it tightens up. I tried applying my foundation and found the product did not allow my make up to go smoothly over my face. I could not blend foundation. I had to drag my foundation across my face which caused pulling. Not worth the money.

I absolutely love that this product It smells amazing and my boyfriend noticed a difference (without me pointing it out ) the next day! It stands up to its promises and I use ester Lauder usually for my products that I buy for my wrinkle creams and serums. Not anymore though. Can anyone tell me if the jar like this with added spf is exactly the same besides the added spf ? If it's the same I'm so excited for this because I already love the original.

Do not purchase if you plan on wearing it under makeup!!! It is and okay product to use before bed at night to moisturize but cannot be worn with makeup like the original version could! I love the original version and I'm very disappointed I spent the money on the whip one:(

I've never used a moisturizer because I've always had skin that is oily. I tried Olay whipped and WOW what a difference it's made in two weeks. My skin looks more radiant, the marionette lines around my mouth are smoothing out and my foundation looks so much smoother with Olay whips under it.

Smells wonderful. Light, not greasy, goes a long way and it has SPF in it! When used before makeup it doesn't leave me Cakey. I have paired with another layer of sunscreen but I only do that with direct sun exposure because sun dries me out and sunscreen is oily. I would recommend. Going to try their other products Now!

I am an African American 60+ woman and have been using this product for approximately 2 months. I am beginning to see an improved difference in my skin. It glows and is it not as uneven prior to using this product. I am also using on my neck with hopes that it will help with the gradual sagging.

I have been using for about 6 months. I can see my fine lines decreasing. Especially on my neck. Would recommend. My only negative is the cap on the inside is hard to open. The first several bottles I purchased had a different cap, it was easier than the newest one. Need to be easy to open !

I received a sample of this moisturizer and I must say I'm impressed. It has almost a gel like feel to it, goes on easy and absorbs quickly. It gave my skin almost a mat look when I put it on. I normally have very oily skin that gets worse with a moisturizer. However this product did do that. I was able to wear it under my makeup no problem. And it smells wonderful. I would recommend this product.

This moisturizer is simply amazing! It's is so very light & airy but a tiny amount covers your entire face. It soaks in your skin immediately without feeling heavy, oily or sticky. Leaves just a soft and clean feeling. You won't be able to stop touching your face! And the smell is awesome!

My face is super oily, so it has been very hard finding something that doesn't cause a massive oil slick and make up melt down by noon. This has decreased the meltdown dramatically! I wish they would have come out with this sooner! Would love if it were fragrance free, as I prefer not to have fragrance in my skin care

I loved this product; however I have multiple chemical sensitivity and cannot handle any perfumes. After a few days I had to stop using the product. However, I loved the way it felt and I believe if I could have continued use, I could have seen a dramatic difference in my skin. Please consider making a fragrance free version.

I really like the feel of this on my skin. My skin feels soft, moisturized, and absorbs well. But you must make a fragrance free version. I won't be purchasing until that is an option. I am very sensitive to fragrance and that's always a deal breaker when it comes to skin care.

I have used the Oil of Olay regenerist for a long time and the serum for about a year. I love the serum and use it in warmer weather because it is light and absorbs quickly. The regenerist is heavier and does not absorb as quickly, but it leaves my skin feeling moisturized. I was really excited to try the whip, but I am not a fan, it leaves my face feeling very tight, dry and mask like.

This product does not disappoint with the light as air effect it has on your face. You know it's working with the gentle tingling all over your face and neck. I haven't even used the product a week and I noticed my wrinkles and fine lines on my face had soften. Love this product and looking forward to trying the other products. I like this product but not as well as I like the Regenerist serum pump. I like the results better and it last long because of it being in a pump bottle but the pump on those has issues with working correctly. I have had 2 to 3 bottles that the pump has quit working. I have used only Olay products for about 40 years. The serum has been the best. Can you please send me some coupons?

Love this product on my face. Not heavy or greasy at all. I have been using this product for a week now and I can already see the difference. Even my co workers noticed the difference on my skin. I use it day and night. The funny thing is I have my husband 'whip' day and night and his skin has improved so much. I'm SOLD! I love Whips so much that I preordered the SPF version too! [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

This whip face moisturizer makes your face feel wonderful. Soft and full of moisture and does not feel heavy on the face likes a lot of other moisturizers I have used. I only received the product about 10 days ago but I love it so far. So whipped & creamy & feels wonderful on my skin. Helps hydrate my face during these dring winter months but light enough to use year-round. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I'm hoping it will lessen the same smile lines over then next month [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

My skin felt smooth and cool with a velvet touch. My skin is very sensitive and after cleansing It would still feel a little warm to touch and sort of a little dry. When I apply the whip it starts to feel so cool and smooth. My skin is also protected from the sun even if I am out only for a few minutes. I don't feel dried and hot on my face like I use to. It feels so good on my face, [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

This product smooths on and disappears instantly. I like that it has a 25 spf and am looking forward to it being my summer moisturizer. I have used Olays other spf moisturizes for years. Thinks for making a light weight one. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I received this product as part of a promotion from Olay. It lives up to its description of instant absorption and leaving your skin feeling soft and smooth. Living in Florida, the SPF25 is a major plus for me. The reason I gave it 4 stars for effectiveness is because I have only been using this product for a week and it is too soon to see if it reduces the appearance of fine lines.
